title: Amazing unit in Loop with hw floors, w/d in unit &walkin closet
posting_body: Interested in this property?
Click on: Reply to this listing for more information

This amazing luxury apartment building is located in the heart of the Loop.
Such a convenient location in the loop where you can walk to Millennium Park and CTA.
Take advantage of this awesome jr unit.
Green building.
Cats & dogs OK Garage parking extra.
No security deposit.

This building has fabulous country club like amenities including: -24 hour doorman -24 hour concierge service -Rooftop deck with an unbelievable grassy area to BBQ, lounge, and to enjoy the terrific views of the city.
High speed internet access and a full size outdoor bar also available to all residents.

-Outdoor hot tub -State of the art full gym -24 hour business center and media station -Private movie theater open 24 hours a day  -Room service available 24/7  -Private hospitality suite available for your family and visitors  This unit offers an open floor plan with great views and has every upgrade imaginable including: -Washer/Dryer in unit -Tons of closet space and walk in closets -Hardwood floors -Granite counter tops -S.S. appliances -10 foot ceilings and four-pipe year round heating and cooling -High efficiency windows throughout
Velocity Apartment Group
*****For faster response from one of our Agents, please provide your cell phone number, move date and email address when inquiring.
Thank you.
